How to redeem in this app and not giving anything
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Select the codes you want to redeem (touch the circles ⭕), then press the gift 🎁 icon at the top (then enter user id only once if prompted), then enter your verification code from the game and press Redeem. Note question mark❓helper buttons for screenshots. When done get back here to fix your review 🤭

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, 👋🏼 thx for the feedback. First time I hear there's a problem with vip codes (the Lilith Games api used is the same for both 🤔). There is a bug where a failed authentication gets the progress bar stuck instead of showing an error. Assuming this was tried multiple times, let's perhaps try live debug for your next vip code afkredeem@gmail.com

The loading takes so long whyyyyy
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Lilith Games set a limit to the redeem api that allows a single code redeem only every 5 seconds 😕 so the app waits for 5 second every code it redeems: 

https://github.com/afkredeem/afkredeem-flutter/commit/3e9641794cdba44ec1285c0222ef9968b6a6d6f6#diff-b71ff6e43231074530b40fe2b9aba35cddf7fa2cd521a7521dc62d0bb64e1cfaR237

google_play_reviews.content: This app shouldn't have to exist, but I'm glad it does.

Pretty good first draft of an app. Some suggestions for improvement: 1) Provide an options setting that lets us decide what notifications we get for any new codes coming in. Right now they're set to On, without any way to turn them Off within the app. 2) Provide a filter to display the codes by release date (ascending or descending), as well as whether they are still available (i.e. active vs expired). Right now the dates are all out of order - I would prefer latest codes displayed first.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks.

1. Since currently notifications are issued only for new codes, OS setting can work, will update if that ever changes.

2. Codes* are sorted firstly by active / not (purple vs. grey checkbox) then by descending date.

* essrysfcrm & xiaban886 are expired (most websites are simply not updated - the app addresses expiration automatically)

google_play_reviews.content: Straight forward UI and lightweight UX. Nicely AFK Arena themed!
